thing-type.label: LZW60 4-in-1 motion sensor
thing-type.description: 4-in-1 motion sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtLight: Save energy by making sure lights don’t turn on if it’s bright enough.</li&gt <li&gtMotion: Be notified when you’re away and automate your lighting.</li&gt <li&gtHumidity: To avoid excess moisture, trigger fans and dehumidifiers.</li&gt <li&gtTemperature: Smarter climate control by monitoring every room in your home.</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut your hub into inclusion mode and press the button on the back of the 4-in-1 sensor one time.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut your hub into exclusion mode and press the button on the back of the 4-in-1 sensor one time. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo wake up the sensor so that your hub can send it configuration parameters quickly press on the button on the back 3 times.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Low Battery Power Level Alarm
parameter.description: Value at which sensor reports low battery to the gateway

parameter.name: config_13_2
parameter.label: 13: PIR Trigger Time
parameter.description: PIR Trigger Time (Time Between PIR Readings)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe amount of seconds between motion detection (ie. interval)</p&gt <p&gt5 = 5 seconds</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Basic Set Command Send after PIR Trigger
parameter.description: Basic Set Command Send after PIR Trigger<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtShould Basic Set Command be sent after PIR is triggered:</p&gt <p&gt0=No, 1 = Yes</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: PIR Trigger Correspondence Action
parameter.description: PIR Trigger Correspondence Action<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAbility to reverse the Basic Set behavior for devices associated in group 2.</p&gt <p&gt0 = Turn the associated device ON when motion is tripped, and OFF when motion stops.</p&gt <p&gt1 = Turn the associated device OFF when motion is tripped, and ON when motion stops.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_100_1
parameter.label: 100: Change Parameters 101-104 Back to Default Settings
parameter.description: Change Parameters 101-104 Back to Default Settings<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf changes are made to parameters 101-104, you can set parameter 100 to 1 to reset 101-104 back to default.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_101_4
parameter.label: 101: Temperature Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Temperature Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval between when temperature is reported to the gateway</p&gt <p&gt0=Off, 1 = 1 second</p&gt <p&gt(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_102_4
parameter.label: 102: Humidity Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Humidity Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval between when humidity is reported to the gateway</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off, 1 = 1 second</p&gt <p&gt(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_103_4
parameter.label: 103: Luminance Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Luminance Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval between when luminance is reported to the gateway</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off, 1 = 1 second</p&gt <p&gt(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_104_4
parameter.label: 104: Battery Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Battery Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval between when battery is reported to the gateway</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off, 1 = 1 second</p&gt <p&gt(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_110_1
parameter.label: 110: Send Reports According to Threshold
parameter.description: Only send sensor reports if the below thresholds are met<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtOnly send sensor reports if the below thresholds are met. 1:Yes, 0:No</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_111_2
parameter.label: 111: Temperature Threshold
parameter.description: Temperature Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the threshold of the temperature for your sensor</p&gt <p&gt1 = .1 degree Celsius (I know... wish it was Fahrenheit), 500 = 50 degrees Celsius</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_112_1
parameter.label: 112: Humidity Threshold
parameter.description: Humidity Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the threshold of the humidity for your sensor</p&gt <p&gt1 = 1%, 2 = 2%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_113_2
parameter.label: 113: Luminance Threshold
parameter.description: Luminance Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the threshold of the luminance for your sensor</p&gt <p&gt1 = 1 unit lux, 2 = 2 unit lux</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_114_1
parameter.label: 114: Battery Threshold
parameter.description: Battery Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the threshold of the battery for your sensor</p&gt <p&gt1 = 1%, 2 = 2%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Group 1
parameter.description: Sensor will send updates<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ol&gt<li&gtNotification Report<br /&gtSensor will send notification report when motion detection unknown location and (event inactive)</li&gt <li&gtMultilevel Sensor Report<br /&gtSensor will send multilevel sensor report (temperature, humidity, luminance) interval of 2 hours</li&gt <li&gtBattery Report<br /&gtSensor will send battery report when the battery level is low and the battery report's value is 0xFF</li&gt <li&gtDevice Reset Locally</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Group 2
parameter.description: Send Basic Set when PIR is triggered
